author: IGN
description:
Pack your parka and get ready to hit the snowy slopes because June means winter for the developers downunder. Jump aboard with us on June 7 at 4pm PT to find the finest games Australia and the rest of the wintery world has to offer.

#IGN
title: FrostyGames Fest 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for House on Eden, a horror film distributed by Shudder.

Paranormal investigators Kris, Celina, and their videographer Jay expect the usual scares when they set out on their latest case. But after being mysteriously rerouted to an abandoned house deep in the woods, they find themselves facing a force unlike anything they’ve encountered before. As the night spirals into chaos, missing crew members and eerie phenomena hint at an ancient, malevolent presence watching their every move.

House of Eden stars Kris Collins and Celina Myers. The film is written and directed by Collins, who also stars alongside Myers and Jason-Christopher Mayer.

House of Eden is releasing in theaters on July 25.

#IGN #Movies #Shudder
title: House on Eden - Official Trailer (2025) Kris Collins, Celina Myers

author: IGN
description:
The future is now – and they are showcasing some of the most unbelievable trailers from upcoming titles and games that have yet to face the spotlight. Join us here on June 7th at 1pm PT for the Future Games Show Summer Showcase.

#IGN
title: Future Game Show Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
It’s not easy staying green, but with these games, it can be a lot of fun. Tune in on June 7th at 1pm PT for the Green Games Showcase, a virtual show filled with games to help you take better care of our planet. 

#IGN
title: Green Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to Day 2 of IGN Live! It may be our last day but we’re ending this year with a blast as we dive into even more exclusives, interviews from games just announced, and a few more surprises for those on the floor as well as at home.

We kick off the second day celebration with the Xbox Showcase – where we will cheer on the new titles, talk about what went on with our team of experts, and bring in the Xbox Team to answer your burning questions. We chat with the creators behind the hit show Last of Us, face the music with composer Austin Wintory, and find out what’s next with Twisted Metal Season 2.  

Check out our schedule for the full list of titles and entertainment waiting for you on Day 1 of IGN Live.

#IGN
title: IGN LIVE DAY 2: Xbox Showcase, The Last of Us, FBC: Firebreak, and MORE!

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Parachute Featurette for Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning, as Tom Cruise lights a parachute on fire while said parachute is supporting his weight, leading to a free fall of fiery proportions.

Check out this featurette from Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning the movie starring Tom Cruise as Ethan Hunt, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg, Esai Morales, Pom Klementieff, Henry Czerny, Holt McCallany, Janet McTeer, Nick Offerman, Hannah Waddingham, Tramell Tillman and Angela Bassett, Shea Whigham, Greg Tarzan Davis, Charles Parnell, Mark Gatiss, with Rolf Saxon, Lucy Tulugarjuk.

Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning is produced by Tom Cruise and Christopher McQuarrie. David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Don Granger, and Chris Brock serve as executive producers. Based on the television series by Bruce Geller. It is written by Christopher McQuarrie & Erik Jendresen.

Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning, directed by Christopher McQuarrie, is now playin
title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning: Official Parachute Featurette (2025) Tom Cruise

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer for Sonic X Shadow Generations, the hit 3D platformer developed by SEGA and Sonic Team. Players can get their hands on two epic adventures in one collection, remastered and enhanced for Nintendo Switch 2. Travel across space and time as past and modern versions of Sonic converge in Sonic X Shadow Generations, available now for Nintendo Switch 2 alongside PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #SonictheHedgehog #SEGA
title: Sonic X Shadow Generations - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
For the first time ever, horror fans will step into the post-apocalyptic wasteland of Prime Video’s “Fallout,” in an all-new terrifying haunted house at Universal Studios’ Halloween Horror Nights. The unimaginable terror becomes a reality starting Friday, August 29 at Universal Orlando Resort and Thursday, September 4 at Universal Studios Hollywood. 
Based on the award-winning global video game franchise from Bethesda Game Studios, “Fallout” was a critically acclaimed hit with audiences worldwide when it debuted on Prime Video in 2024. The cinematic series is set in the year 2296, two hundred years after a nuclear war destroyed civilization. All that is left is an eradicated and highly violent hellscape known as The Wasteland crawling with mutated animals and creatures, while gentle citizens take refuge underground in luxury fallout shelters known as Vaults. 
In this terrifying haunted house, fans will encounter iconic scenes and characters that will put them into the frightening acti
title: Universal Studios' Halloween Horror Nights - Official Fallout Announcement Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We finally have a Nintendo Switch 2, and it's time to take it out of its box!

Not only do we do a Nintendo Switch 2 unboxing, but we also open up and check out the Nintendo Switch 2 Pro Controller, and the Switch 2 Camera. We also have a boxed Mario Kart World cartridge which gets the lick test as well! 

Inside the Nintendo Switch 2's box is the magnetic Joycons, the Switch 2 dock, and the new Joycon rails for mouse use. We explore all the vents and ports of the Nintendo Switch 2 and get a feel for Nintendo's new console.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Unboxing

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Nintendo Switch 2 trailer showing a lineup of games available now on Nintendo GameCube - Nintendo Classics. The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker, F-Zero GX, and SoulCalibur 2 are now available on Nintendo GameCube – Nintendo Classics, exclusively on Nintendo Switch 2 for Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack members.

#IGN #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Official NSO + Expansion Pack: Nintendo GameCube – Nintendo Classics Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to Day 1 of IGN Live! Lace up your shoes, get your gaming thumbs in shape, and warm up your cheer organs for a day packed full of exclusives, never-before seen content, and interviews with all of your favorite celebrities. 

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 takes a victory lap around the main stage while Critical Role celebrates their 10 year anniversary with us live at the event. M3GAN 2.0, Squid Games, Rick and Morty, along with many others will be pulling back the curtain to show off what you have been waiting for. MindsEye drops by to talk about taking the open-world game to the next level in this action-thriller. We find out what happens when rubber meets the road as we talk to Takashi Iizuka, Head of Sonic Team, about Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds.

Check out our schedule for the full list of titles and entertainment waiting for you on Day 1 of IGN Live.

#IGN #IGNLive #summerofgaming
title: IGN LIVE DAY 1: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, M3GAN 2.0, Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, and MORE!

author: IGN
description:
The Latin American Games Showcase is a platform that strives to increase the visibility of the video games being developed in the LATAM Region and Latin Americans in the World. Come to the party on June 7th at 11am PT for all the exclusive titles and new game announcements. 

#IGN
title: Latin American Games Showcase Summer Edition

description:
Check out the Etheria: Restart launch trailer for this turn-based strategy RPG. In Etheria: Restart, to preserve the flame of civilization, humanity transfers their consciousness into the virtual world "Etheria". And you, as a Hyperlinker, will enter the virtual world to uncover the hidden truths of Etheria. Etheria: Restart is available now on PC and mobile.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Etheria: Restart - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Street Fighter 6: Years 1-2 Fighters Edition, a complete edition of the hit fighting game franchise developed by Capcom. The Years 1-2 Fighters Edition is packed with characters and stages released from Years 1 and 2, making a total of 26 characters, including their Outfit 1 Colors 3-10, and 20 stages. The Street Fighter 6: Years 1-2 Fighters Edition is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#StreetFighter6 #Gaming #IGN
title: Street Fighter 6: Years 1-2 Fighters Edition - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Take a look at the Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale third-person shooter developed by Epic Games. Take the thrills of all that Fortnite has to offer on the go with enhanced visuals and 60 FPS performance. Fortnite is available now for Nintendo Switch 2.

#Fortnite #NintendoSwitch2 #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Kiss of the Spider Woman trailer for the upcoming movie musical starring Diego Luna, Tonatiuh and Jennifer Lopez. Kiss of the Spider Woman opens in theaters on October 10, 2025.

Dreamgirls and Beauty and the Beast director Bill Condon returns to the movie musical in this dazzling Technicolor-hued fantasy. Valentín (Diego Luna), a political prisoner, shares a cell with Molina (Tonatiuh), a window dresser convicted of public indecency. The two form an unlikely bond as Molina recounts the plot of a Hollywood musical starring his favorite silver screen diva, Ingrid Luna (Jennifer Lopez). Based on the Tony Award-winning Broadway musical hit.

Kiss of the Spider Woman is written by Bill Condon (screenplay), Manuel Puig (novel), Terrence McNally (stage musical), John Kander (music), Fred Ebb (lyrics). It is produced by Barry Josephson p.g.a, Tom Kirdahy p.g.a Greg Yolen p.g.a.

#KissOfTheSpiderWoman #Movies #IGN
title: Kiss of the Spider Woman - Official Trailer (2025) Jennifer Lopez, Diego Luna, Tonatiuh

author: IGN
description:
Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon reviewed by Will Borger on PC. Also available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S.

Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon is a new take on a tale that has been around for centuries, and as a story and a world, it works. It certainly gives a new meaning to the phrase “The Once and Future King.” All of this has happened before, it claims, and all of it will happen again, unless we put an end to it, and perhaps not even then. The stories we tell ourselves are eternal, repeating, folding into and swirling around each other, mixing in the telling – and, sometimes, a myth and its impact on us is more powerful than the reality that spawned it. That’s just how stories are. That’s how I felt while I played The Fall of Avalon. It fails, sometimes, as a game you play – as a piece of technology, as a product. It is buggy, the quest design is rote, and it has the same flaws as every RPG of this style. But when it works, it really works, and I cannot deny that it comp
title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon Review

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer for Hitman World of Assassination: Signature Edition, a compilation of the three latest stealth action games developed by IO Interactive. Players will embark on a series of missions as the elusive Agent 47 to change disguises, create distractions, and kill the target by any means necessary. Hitman World of Assassination: Signature Edition is available now for Nintendo Switch 2.

#Hitman #NintendoSwitch2 #Gaming
title: Hitman World of Assassination: Signature Edition - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Force of Law Warbond Trailer for Helldivers 2, a third-person action co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. Players can soon gain access to the new Force of Law Warbond packed with new electrifying weapons to enforce the Law during the Illuminate invasion on Super Earth. New weapons such as the GL-52 De-Escalator and the AR-32 Pacifier, Strategems, Grenades, Armor, Capes, and more with a blue patrol theme are included to combat anarchy with unmitigated and supreme ruling. The Force of Law Warbond is launching on June 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#Helldivers2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Helldivers 2 - Official Force of Law Warbond Trailer

description: Get your latest look at The Bornless, the upcoming Lovecraftian eight-player horror extraction first-person shooter where you can summon demons, build factions, and wield Black Magick to survive against other players. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2411280/The_Bornless/
title: The Bornless - Official Steam Next Fest Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer for Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition, the definitive version of the hit first-person open-world action-adventure game developed by CD Projekt Red. Players will assume control of V on a daring story through Night City to attain cybernetic abilities, a suite of powerful and diverse weapons, and climb the ranks from a rising merc to a legendary cyberpunk. Get access to the base game with DLC, which is included alongside Nintendo Switch 2 features such as motion and mouse controls, gyro aiming, and touch screen capabilities. Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition is available now for Nintendo Switch 2 alongside PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Cyberpunk2077UltimateEdition #NintendoSwitch2 #Gaming
title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer for Hogwarts Legacy, the third-person open-world action-adventure game developed by Avalanche Software. Players will embark on a wizarding adventure as a student at Hogwarts to learn spells, master complex combos, and explore a deep narrative. Take the adventure on the go with Hogwarts Legacy, available now on Nintendo Switch 2 alongside being available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#HogwartsLegacy #NintendoSwitch2 #Gaming
title: Hogwarts Legacy - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

description: We spoke to Epic Games about all of the new tools coming to Fortnite's UEFN creation suite. From Star Wars to Scene Graph, we delve into what to expect from the future of the Unreal Editor for Fortnite.
title: Fortnite: Everything Coming to UEFN Explained

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo Switch 2 is available now! After 8 long years, the successor to the incredibly popular hybrid handheld console is out now and brings with it a larger 1080p screen and the ability to play games up to 4K resolution when docked to a TV. Now we're playing with power!

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the GameChat Overview Trailer for Nintendo Switch 2, the latest console generation from Nintendo. Players can use GameChat to talk with friends, share gameplay, and video chat with a compatible USB camera by pressing the C button. GameChat is available for Nintendo Switch 2, launching on June 5.

#IGN #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Official GameChat Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The epic conclusion comes to theaters this November. Watch the #WickedForGood trailer now. 

Directed once again by award-winning director Jon M. Chu and starring the spectacular returning cast, led by Academy Award® nominated superstars Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, the final chapter of the untold story of the witches of Oz begins with Elphaba and Glinda estranged and living with the consequences of their choices. 

Elphaba (Cynthia Erivo), now demonized as The Wicked Witch of the West, lives in exile, hidden within the Ozian forest while continuing her fight for the freedom of Oz’s silenced Animals and desperately trying to expose the truth she knows about The Wizard (Jeff Goldblum). 

Glinda, meanwhile, has become the glamorous symbol of Goodness for all of Oz, living at the palace in Emerald City and reveling in the perks of fame and popularity. Under the instruction of Madame Morrible (Oscar® winner Michelle Yeoh), Glinda is deployed to serve as an effervescent comfort to Oz,
title: Wicked: For Good - Official Trailer (2025) Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Nintendo Switch Online Overview Trailer for Nintendo Switch, the online service for the latest Nintendo hardware. Take a look at what Nintendo Switch Online has in store, such as accessing classic games, GameChat, and more. The Nintendo Switch Online service is available now.

#IGN #NintendoSwitch2
title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Official Nintendo Switch Online Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer #2 for The Life of Chuck, drama genre-bending film distributed by NEON. Join Tom Hiddleston, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Karen Gillan, Jacob Tremblay, and Mark Hamill on an unforgettable story from the minds of Stephen King and Mike Flanagan.

From the hearts and minds of Stephen King and Mike Flanagan comes The Life of Chuck, the extraordinary story of an ordinary man. This unforgettable, genre-bending tale celebrates the life of Charles 'Chuck' Krantz as he experiences the wonder of love, the heartbreak of loss, and the multitudes contained in all of us.

The Life of Chuck, directed by Mike Flanagan, opens in select cities on June 6, and everywhere on June 13, 2025.

#IGN #Movies
title: The Life of Chuck - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Tom Hiddleston, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Karen Gillan

author: IGN
description:
These videos were made to celebrate a GameCube classic entering the Nintendo Switch 2 Online catalogue!

Set sail across the Great Sea with us as we uncover every Piece of Heart in The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker! Whether you're playing the HD version or the original GameCube release, this guide will show you how to get every Piece of Heart and max out Link’s health! 

What You'll Find in This Video:
Where to find every Piece of Heart
How to earn Pieces of Heart from side-quests
Pieces of Heart hidden within Treasure Charts

title: Zelda: The Wind Waker - All 44 Pieces of Heart Locations | Nintendo Switch 2 GCN Online

author: IGN
description:
The World of John Wick gets a little bit bigger with Ballerina, starring Ana de Armas as a vengeful assassin from the Ruska Roma. Spinoffs are a tricky thing to pull off, especially when the franchise is as iconic and beloved as John Wick. But de Armas' Eve goes toe to toe with the Baba Yaga himself and proves that this Ballerina truly belongs in The World of John Wick.

Starring Ana de Armas, Keanu Reeves, Gabriel Byrne and Norman Reedus, check out Ballerina in theaters on June 6 and let us know what you think about it in the comments!
title: From The World of John Wick: Ballerina Review
